translations: 缓解（疼痛或不快的感觉）；减轻（问题的严重性）；接替，替下；调剂，排遣； 给（城镇）解围，解救；救济，救援；使某人摆脱（烦人的责任）；免去，解除；上厕所，排便

sentences.sentence: The doctor drew off some fluid to relieve the pressure.
sentences.translation: 医生排掉了一些液体以缓解压力。

sentences.sentence: The new secretary will relieve us of some of the paperwork.
sentences.translation: 新来的秘书会减轻我们文案工作的一些负担。

sentences.sentence: Drugs can relieve much of the pain.
sentences.translation: 药物可以大大缓解疼痛。
